title: How do i play?
body:
Is it necessary to buy a champion? 
How does the game start anyways??
I have downloaded it on my desktop but i dont know how to start the game or where to click?
Can anyone help me please!!

replies.body:
Hi, welcome to league of legends ♥

It isn't necessary to buy a champion, as you will have 10 free at all times (free week rotation). You will receive Garen and Ashe for free at level 3 as part of hex tech promotion. You can also get tristana and alistar for free by following the instructions on [THIS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202083184-Promotional-Content-Free-Swag-) page.

If you open the application, there is a big orange button in the middle of it that says "launch". Launch the client, log in, then it will come to a different screen that has a big orange button in the same place that says "play". Click a game mode (tutorial/ intro bots) and then press play. 

Check out the new players guide [HERE. ](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/site/guide/index.html)

i find the best way to start is buy taking your mums credit card calling up xiaoweixiao giving him your mums credit card details and purchasing a elo boost, this is generally a really great way to start the game, also spending your life savings on rp to buy skins for me is another great idea. good luck summoner and may the {{summoner:4}} be with u!!
That was a real cool way to help me out thanks
if you can't figure out where to click to open a game that you recently downloaded i would suggest not playing at all.
